metadata.title: CVE-2017-17080 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: elf.c in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), asdistributed in GNU Binutils 2.29.1, does not validate sizes of core notes,which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (bfd_getl32heap-based buffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted objectfile, related to elfcore_grok_netbsd_procinfo,elfcore_grok_openbsd_procinfo, and elfcore_grok_nto_status.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
